      • getApprovalProfileForAction

        org.ejbca.core.model.approval.profile.ApprovalProfile getApprovalProfileForAction​(org.cesecore.certificates.ca.ApprovalRequestType action,
                                                                                  org.cesecore.certificates.ca.CAInfo cainfo,
                                                                                  org.cesecore.certificates.certificateprofile.CertificateProfile certProfile)
        Returns the appropriate approval profile for the given action, where any approval profile defined in the certificate profile trumps any define in the CA
        Parameters:
        action - an approval action
        cainfo - a CA information object
        certProfile - a certificate profile
        Returns:
        the most appropriate profile for the action, or null if none was found.
